    • composeRow

      private java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> composeRow​(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> container_1, java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> container_2)
      Make a collage between 2 arraylist of string cutting the first column of the second arraylist. Simply cat row per row, centering the content in the middle
      Parameters:
      container_1 - first arraylist of string
      container_2 - second arraylist of string
      Returns:
      arraylist of previous 2 arraylist with a row per row cat and centered vertically

    • breakRow

      private java.lang.String breakRow​(int space, java.lang.String start, java.lang.String end, java.lang.String fill, int padding)
      Create a string
      Parameters:
      space - length of string
      start - start char of the string
      end - end char of the string
      fill - fill of the string
      padding - white space betweeb start to fill and fill to end.
      Returns:
      string created
